resources.string: We’ve partnered with AirRobe to enable you to join the circular fashion movement. Re-sell or rent your purchases on AirRobe’s marketplace – all with one simple click. Together, we can do our part to keep fashion out of landfill. Learn more.
By opting in you agree to THE ICONIC’s Privacy Policy and consent for us to share your details with AirRobe.
Toggling the AirRobe "on" will save your purchase (including all product information) to your private AirRobe account to re-sell later.
After you`ve worn and loved your item, simply log into airrobe.com to list your item for sale on AirRobe’s marketplace – in one click.
What if I don`t have an AirRobe account?
Don`t panic! You`ll be directed to set up your free account at the order confirmation page.
Simply activate your free account below to re-sell your items back into a circular economy after you`ve worn and loved them.
